body_html:
Hi Paul, @poxvoculi

I'm using TF_NEED_MPI=1 and MPI_HOME=/usr/bin/openmpi. The three header files the config needs are mpi.h, mpio.h, and mpicxx.h. mpio.h is not available in ubuntu16.04 but the other two are available in different folders.

I updated the env parameters above to reflect this.

The README here doesn't say much about the setup. The default given during manual./configure for MPI_HOME is /usr but it also doesn't work.

Any help would be greatly appreciated! I have looked through a whole bunch of CI build scripts in this repo but no prevail.

https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/tree/master/tensorflow/contrib/mpi

Thanks!

body:
Hi Paul, @poxvoculi 

I'm using `TF_NEED_MPI=1` and `MPI_HOME=/usr/bin/openmpi`. The three header files the config needs are `mpi.h`, `mpio.h`, and `mpicxx.h`. `mpio.h` is not available in ubuntu16.04 but the other two are available in different folders.

I updated the env parameters above to reflect this.

The README here doesn't say much about the setup. The default given during manual`./configure` for `MPI_HOME` is `/usr` but it also doesn't work.

Any help would be greatly appreciated! I have looked through a whole bunch of CI build scripts in this repo but no prevail.

https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/tree/master/tensorflow/contrib/mpi

Thanks!
